intro:
Throw, Dodge, Catch! Grab victory with all your might!
Engage in intense battles in this new and improved dodgeball game!
description:
It's dodgeball on your desk!
Share Joy-Con™ and enjoy the game with up to 4 players!
With simple controls, make quick decisions and strategic moves!

Create a unique player with style settings!
Build your own player with a wide variety of customization options!

Many special rules and courts are available!
Acquire formations and uniforms, and aim for the ultimate original team!


[Practice Match]
Enjoy casual single-player matches where you can set various balls and rules.

[Friendly Match]
Play with up to 4 players!
Freely combine teams and enjoy dodgeball with everyone!

[Team Selection]
Freely set player names, uniforms, and styles, and create your own original team!

[Tournament]
Defeat formidable opponents and aim to win the World Championship!

[Capsule Shoot]
Use the points earned in each mode to acquire new uniforms and formations!
Obtain rare items to strengthen your team!

[Mini Game]
Dodge the balls to earn points!
The golden ball is a chance for even more points!
